Focus.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. If you have at least 3 play points, draw 2 instead and restore 2 defense to your leader. At the end of your turn, remove this effect.
Focus.baseFlair_:
One. Be silent and thoughtful. Awareness of your entire body is essential. Two. Until you are capable of coming to a complete halt, you should not so much as move a muscle.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist, Preface

Mechanization.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 2 copies of 2 of the following cards into your deck.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Ancient Artifact
-Mystic Artifact
-Radiant Artifact

Artifact Scan.baseEffect_: Put copies of 2 random allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match into your hand. Then, if more than 6 allied Artifact cards with different names have been destroyed this match, change their costs to 0.
Artifact Scan.baseFlair_:
Chief sent us a missive about the most common workplace accidents. We all had a good laugh at how absurd they were, especially number twenty. Then Chief said, "Go dig up the bodies and ask them yourselves."
—Artifact Researcher

Biofabrication.baseEffect_:
Subtract 1 from the cost of an Artifact card in your hand.
Put 3 copies of that Artifact card into your deck.
Biofabrication.baseFlair_: If evolution is the incentive, progression is the objective.

Sure-Sighted Lancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower whose attack or defense has been raised.
Sure-Sighted Lancer.baseFlair_: Heh... You seem awfully proud of that expensive armor and weaponry. But my lance here will ferret out your weaknesses and pierce right through them!
Sure-Sighted Lancer.evoFlair_: Strength is weakness and fortes are flaws. Any advantage has drawbacks, is what I'm saying. Get ready, evildoers—my lance is one sharp analyst.

Robotic Engineer.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Robotic Engineer.baseFlair_: Don't ask me what to do. I was born without a shred of creativity. Just give me the schematics, and I'll follow them to a T. That's all I'm good for anyway...
Robotic Engineer.evoFlair_:
That guy's knack for reproducing designs is nuts. It's like he literally pulls the finished product out of the blueprints, down to the last bolt. I'm not even joking.
—A Fellow Engineer

Inspired Inventor.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Miraculous Invention or Hazardous Invention into your hand.
Inspired Inventor.baseFlair_: It came to me in a flash! Not just one idea, but two! Only problem is, I can't decide which one to build. Aahh, it's so hard to choose!
Inspired Inventor.evoFlair_:
Combat really isn't my area of expertise... but I'm one heck of an inventor!
What? I'm a great fighter, too? Aww, c'mon, now! Don't make me blush!

Mechagun Wielder.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (8): Put 2 random Artifact cards into your hand instead, and recover 7 play points.
Mechagun Wielder.baseFlair_: The first change led to discovery. Everyone saw that if you could somehow use these machines, then you would hold the power to change the world within the palm of your hand. —Robot Research Log, Part 2
Mechagun Wielder.evoFlair_: The possibilities of machines are limitless. They can immediately manifest the wishes of their users. I wonder how the ambitions of mankind will change the machines in turn. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 2

Barrage Brawler.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. If you have at least 3 play points, deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower and 1 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Barrage Brawler.baseFlair_:
One. Training the body was once thought the only path. Know now: that path leads nowhere. Two. Temper though you might, flesh is not steel. For armor, turn to the forge.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body
Barrage Brawler.evoFlair_:
Three. Training the body is a fruitless pursuit of strength. It is not the true Way of the Fist. Four. Prepare yourself by donning steel. Only then will you find the true path.
—The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Body

Technomancer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select an allied Artifact follower and put a copy of it into your hand.
Technomancer.baseFlair_: Start small—it's most efficient. Go too big, and you invite careless mistakes. Remember, don't lose the machines for the factory.
Technomancer.evoFlair_: If you can accomplish great things by starting small, you're clever. But if you start big and end up with something small, you're an idiot. Listen, everything's made up of atoms—that's the beauty of the world.

Joy of Destruction.baseEffect_:
Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
(Can be played only when both a targetable allied card and enemy card are in play.)
Joy of Destruction.baseFlair_: Say, if you had to pick between me or the world, which would you choose? I mean, do I even need to ask?

Doll Operation.baseEffect_:
Give a random Puppet in your hand +4/+0.
Enhance (7): Put 2 Puppets into your hand. Then give 2 random Puppets in your hand +4/+0 instead.
Doll Operation.baseFlair_: For all that dolls began as human simulacrums, they seem to become more advanced the further their appearance deviates from those origins.

Syntonization.baseEffect_:
Choose: Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Analyzing Artifact
-Bifurcating Artifact
-Radiant Artifact
-Paradigm Shift
Syntonization.baseFlair_: They converse through the resonance of steel. Metallic sounds ring out and connect distant places, travelling much farther than organic voices.

Metaproduction.baseEffect_:
Put an Analyzing Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Metaproduction.baseFlair_: If I were a god, I would have never created humans. I'd prefer something much simpler, much more obedient—a servant.

Metadivision.baseEffect_:
Put a Radiant Artifact into your deck.
At the end of your turn, draw a card.
Metadivision.baseFlair_:
One could say these blueprints are like a letter from an era gone by. The author's fervor is palpable from the design alone.
—Studious Engineer

Enigmatic Aether.baseEffect_:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, put a Radiant Artifact into your hand.
Enigmatic Aether.baseFlair_:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the scientists discovered her kindness during their research, they saw an advanced, marvelous aether. They soon learned that it grants power to those who test the boundaries of civilization.

Augmentation Bestowal.baseEffect_: Give your leader the following effect until the end of this turn: Whenever an allied Artifact card comes into play, recover 1 play point and draw a card.
Augmentation Bestowal.baseFlair_: Lighting lamps and consulting maps, humans are guided through this world by their tools. It is for this reason that technology is, in fact, a form of divinity worthy of worship.

Acceleratium.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give it Rush.
Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point.
Acceleratium.baseFlair_: Wings? I'd prefer something with a little more sophistication. —Geno, Machine Artisan

Ancient Apparatus.baseEffect_:
If you have at least 1 play point and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as an Artifact Squadron or Artifact's Glow.
----------
Countdown (2)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact, Prime Artifact.
Ancient Apparatus.baseFlair_: Occasionally the contraptions of antiquity become the innovations of posterity.

Ancient Amplifier.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
Ancient Amplifier.baseFlair_: Absorbing traces of magical power, it amplifies and supplies it, as if a maternal provider to those who are willing to come take it.

Nilpotent Entity.baseEffect_:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and add 2 to this amulet's Countdown.
Until this amulet leaves play, your leader can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
Nilpotent Entity.baseFlair_: The path to omnipotence exists within the beyond.

Orb of Desecration.baseEffect_:
Countdown (25)
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Subtract 15 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower is destroyed, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Whenever an allied follower evolves, subtract 2 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Summon an Avatar of Desecration.
Orb of Desecration.baseFlair_:
"Drink in defilement!"
"Purify it!"
They flirted with forbidden knowledge, a sinister gambol with blasphemy and corruption, and created something inhuman—something to transcend humanity.

Puppeteer.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give a random Puppet in your hand Bane.
Puppeteer.baseFlair_: Behold, and see! My beloved puppet dances with delight, almost as if it lives!
Puppeteer.evoFlair_: Oh, my beloved puppet... it seems that I've not bestowed upon you enough life. Hmm... Yes, of course—let's simply take theirs!

Mechanized Servant.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Mechanized Servant.baseFlair_: Do you know my master? I see. In that case, say goodnight!
Mechanized Servant.evoFlair_: Where is my master? Is it you? Hm. Maybe. Prove it to me!

Magisteel Lion.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Analyzing Artifacts into your deck.
Magisteel Lion.baseFlair_: Grr... Roar! (Beat it, kid! My master has no interest in punks like you!)
Magisteel Lion.evoFlair_: Rra... Rawrgh ! (You still here? You're not worth a second of my master's time! Worthless! Worthless, I say!)

Bear Puppeteer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+1. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Bear Puppeteer.baseFlair_: I'm looking for a soul, for science. If I give one to teddy, surely he'll talk, right?
Bear Puppeteer.evoFlair_: I'm gonna give your soul to teddy, see? This way, I'll never be alone.

Hamelin.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Select a follower in your hand (excluding Hamelin) that originally costs 3 play points or less. Put a copy of that follower into your hand.
Hamelin.baseFlair_: Dear listeners, join me on a musical journey! Just follow the tune of my magical melodies—the sound of my pipe compels you!
Hamelin.evoFlair_: It's the march that never ends—nowhere and forever! Hey, where do you think you're going? Just follow me!

Mech Wing Swordsman.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your deck: Analyzing Artifact, Ancient Artifact, Mystic Artifact, Radiant Artifact.
Mech Wing Swordsman.baseFlair_: I don't believe it—I'm actually flying! That lady's a genius!
Mech Wing Swordsman.evoFlair_: It's like a dream! Soaring through the skies, I'll be unstoppable—even dragons won't stand a chance!

Demon's Epitaph.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and gain Rush and Bane.
Demon's Epitaph.baseFlair_: It was just supposed to be a ledger of sorts—I didn't think it'd actually come to life. —Master Puppeteer
Demon's Epitaph.evoFlair_: My laboratory, reduced to ashes—how am I supposed to take notes now? —Banished Puppeteer

Knower of History.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Prime Artifact into your deck.
Knower of History.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Knower of History.baseFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. They're living witnesses to history. But everyone's forgotten them. That's why these girls are so lonely.
Knower of History.evoFlair_: Artifacts aren't just objects. Their bodies are filled with history. Try to remember... remember what the world used to look like.

Ancient War Machine.baseEffect_: When an allied Artifact follower comes into play, this follower gains Ward.
Ancient War Machine.baseFlair_: Sometimes I can getcha up and running and sometimes ya won't even turn on. I think I'll call ya... The "I dunno if you'll work this time" machine! —An Inventor
Ancient War Machine.evoFlair_: So ya work better when your buddies are around, eh? Then I'll call ya the "Looks scary but actually just lookin' fer friends" machine! —An Inventor

Hydro Alchemist.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put either a Guardform Golem or a Strikeform Golem into your deck. If Resonance is active for you, put both a Guardform Golem and a Strikeform Golem into your deck instead.
Hydro Alchemist.baseFlair_: Haha, I might be a genius! If something has no fixed form, that just means it can be shaped into anything! All right, my cute little golems! Let's try some more exciting looks!
Hydro Alchemist.evoFlair_:
"Huh... For imitations, these aren't half bad."
—Paracelsus

Mia, Angelic Doll.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3 and put 2 Puppets into your hand.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
Mia, Angelic Doll.evoEffect_: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, put a Puppet into your hand.
Mia, Angelic Doll.baseFlair_: Excuse me... Can you help me? I know I look like a doll, but actually an evil man trapped my soul inside this puppet! Will you please help me look for my original body?
Mia, Angelic Doll.evoFlair_: Thank you! It's hard to move this doll's joints, the clothes are too cute and fluffy, and I just feel completely helpless. If I had tear ducts, I would've already cried my eyes out. But now that I'm with you, I have a good feeling I'll finally relocate my body!

Prototype Warrior.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Bifurcating Artifacts into your deck.
Prototype Warrior.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a variety of phenomena. When the orb was unearthed, it brought forth wide-reaching change; the machines had come. —Robot Research Log, Part 1
Prototype Warrior.evoFlair_: The existence of this core will advance both human and machinekind. It's given us plenty to hypothesize about, so now all that's left is proper experimentation. I wonder how the world will change from our discoveries. —Researcher's Reflections, Part 1

Cat Gunner.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
Cat Gunner.baseFlair_:
Cat Cannoneer?
I don't appreciate being lumped together with her, ya meow! Her cannon's totally lacking on paw-er, see what I mean? This is a brand-new original creation, the Paw-Cannon!
Cat Gunner.evoFlair_:
"Hey! Your Paw-Cannon's totally ripping off mine!"
"It's not a rip-off, it's, uh, an homage!"
—Cat Cannoneer and Cat Gunner

Doll Meister.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Put a Puppet into your hand and give it Bane.
Doll Meister.baseFlair_: As the current head of a long line of puppet masters, I've grown fond of making puppets geared toward children. Yet the customers don't come by my shop anymore. I wonder why...
Doll Meister.evoFlair_: I see now where I had erred. I was too obsessed with tradition, and as such the masses find my work to be out-of-date. So I've decided to keep up with the times. Behold my latest creation—dearest Julie!

Drill Hedgehog.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Drill Hedgehog.baseFlair_:
Concept: Enforce with both weaponry and armor.
Subjects: Small, weak animals.
Mission: Preserve endangered species.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team A
Drill Hedgehog.evoFlair_: We've succeeded with part one of the plan. Though the change in ecology resulting from expansion of their habitat came unexpectedly. Nonetheless, we'll continue to observe their ongoing war against bladed hedgehogs. For the good of all of us.

Begoggled Mole.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Begoggled Mole.baseFlair_:
Concept: Reinforcement of weak points.
Subjects: Animals with substandard senses.
Mission: Research wild animals' potential.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team D
Begoggled Mole.evoFlair_: Above is a mole we've seen often of late. Reclaiming its species' lost visual acuity has given it a whole new way of life. We must continue to observe this artificially-induced evolution. For the good of all of us.

Android Artisan.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Paradigm Shift into your hand.
Android Artisan.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis brought about new technology. We no longer need extensive equipment or advanced facilities to tinker with machinery. As a result, devices have grown lighter and inventing more efficient. —Tech Research and Development, Report 1
Android Artisan.evoFlair_:
Technology, and therefore machinery, exists for its own sake. As such, inventors believe that one day machines will surpass humanity. The world toddles towards a completely mechanized future, free of human influence.
—Boon of Technology, Part 1

Marionette Expert.baseEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Marionette Expert.baseFlair_: Witness the Two of Cups, flowing in unison. Bound as they are, the two souls steal gazes at each other when the master isn't looking. Though this affair may be fleeting, their lovestruck hearts yearn for an encore.
Marionette Expert.evoFlair_: Greetings from the puppet master, tugger of heartstrings. See, people bemoan the rifts that drive them apart. But I warp space so they may come together... So what if the joy I bring is manufactured? It's real to them, and that's all that matters.

Magisteel Puppet.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Magisteel Puppet.baseFlair_: To unravel the secrets of life, it is only logical to dismantle all lives. That is what master has requested—what master wishes for.
Magisteel Puppet.evoFlair_: This body of steel simply seeks the essence of life—to fulfill master's order, and to one day create a life for master.

Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Ward.
Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.baseFlair_: The sky is my domain to explore! They aren't real, but with these wings I can fly anywhere!
Rosa, Mech Wing Maiden.evoFlair_: To protect my beloved, I'll do anything—my feelings are pure! Even if it pains me, I want to be with the one I truly love.

Flower Doll.baseEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
Flower Doll.evoEffect_: Last Words: If you have at least 4 cards in your hand, put a Puppet into your hand. If you have 3 cards or less in your hand, put a Puppet and a Flower Doll into your hand.
Flower Doll.baseFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. Even after my master withers away, I'll stand over and guard this grave until the end of time.
Flower Doll.evoFlair_: This is the garden of eternity. My master loved me for the white flower I was, and for eternity I will bloom forever, here in the master's stead.

Icarus.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Ancient Artifacts into your deck.
Icarus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Icarus.baseFlair_: Hey, check out these wings! Pretty brilliant, huh? I guess you could call me a genius of sorts, I invented 'em myself!
Icarus.evoFlair_: Maybe someday there'll be wings for everyone! If we all could be so free, we could even fly all the way to the sun!

Machine Artisan, Geno.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and give your leader the following effect - Subtract 3 from the next source of damage your leader takes.
Machine Artisan, Geno.baseFlair_: Yeah, I can fix it for ya—for a price, of course. Hm? What do I take for payment? I'm but a simple man, what do you think? Pay up!
Machine Artisan, Geno.evoFlair_: Listen here, buddy—I ain't running a charity. Man's gotta make a living somehow. Nothing personal, it's just business!

Miriam, Synthetic Being.baseEffect_: If you have at least 2 play points and Resonance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a L'Ange Miriam or La Diablotine Miriam.
Miriam, Synthetic Being.baseFlair_: My life is synthetic, and so is my body. But my heart doesn't come from anyone else. I want to battle together with you. I really do!
Miriam, Synthetic Being.evoFlair_: Other people made my life and my body. But my heart is mine and mine alone. I can be strong if we're together. I really believe I can!

Disciple of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then draw 2 cards.
Disciple of Destruction.baseFlair_: Destroy, destroy, destroy. If it exists, it deserves to be destroyed. There is no future without destruction—dress for the apocalypse, dance to the damage!
Disciple of Destruction.evoFlair_:
The Second Order: Abide No Rule
Order is the enemy of the masses. Every desire to rebel should be carried to its fullest expression. Smash and trample everything.
—The Teachings of Team Destruction

Marionette Lad.evoEffect_: Last Words: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Marionette Lad.baseFlair_: My little sister's real sick, so she's stuck in bed. But it's okay, 'cause I met a man who promised to make her live forever!
Marionette Lad.evoFlair_:
Why... How... What's happened. To me?
My sister and. Me. We're puppets... Now.
This is wrong... This is all wrong!

Licht, the Gearturner.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Licht, the Gearturner.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Licht, the Gearturner.baseFlair_: All creations have their own purposes—those which must be fulfilled... And I too, shall play my part. Zahnrad, the grace of your wings shall make life dance.
Licht, the Gearturner.evoFlair_: No matter how many times it breaks, no matter how many times it rusts, I will always repair it. After all, there is nothing sadder than a purpose unfulfilled. Now, my gears, serve your purpose.

Cat Tuner.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a copy of a random allied follower destroyed this match that costs X play points into your hand. X equals your remaining play points.
Cat Tuner.baseFlair_: Hark, the herald of Judgement, bringer of rejuvenation! Mender of broken bodies, lifter of spirits, and petter of four-legged friends. She'll be there to help you when no one else can.
Cat Tuner.evoFlair_: A tuner like me restores things to their original state. Waiting around for help is so dull and dumb. You can't expect it to fall into your lap. You gotta put in some effort and seek it.

Paracelsus.evoEffect_: Evolve: Choose - Put a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem into your hand.
Paracelsus.baseFlair_: If the automatons we build outshine man on the battlefield, humanity's future has no glory. Mankind should flourish; anything less would be unromantic. However... there are those who have no potential. It will be amusing weeding them out.
Paracelsus.evoFlair_: Humanity will forge its own future. That much is absolute fact, just as history tells us. However, there is no history devoid of sacrifice. As such, I shall activate them for the people who inhabit this world.

Rukina of the Resistance.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied Portalcraft followers the following effect - Can't be destroyed by spells and effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from spells and effects.)
Rukina of the Resistance.baseFlair_: There must be more to life than victory. I truly believe that, which is why I want to put people's safety first. Even if that is a philosophy unbefitting a commander...
Rukina of the Resistance.evoFlair_: I am no hero. I am truly nothing close. I think I'm only hiding from my own failings... as a commander and as a person. Silently hoping someone will notice... and give me the push I need to change.

Shin, Lawful Light.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Put a Chaos Awakens into your hand.
Shin, Lawful Light.baseFlair_: I've been waiting so long for the day I would meet you. I'll remember this moment forever... Now, come. We'll bring new order to this world.
Shin, Lawful Light.evoFlair_: We have to save absolutely everyone. How? Haha. You can leave that to me. Seriously, it'll be all right—I can embrace whatever I please... Now, come. It's time for the world to remember chaos.

Vier, Doll Slayer.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Whenever an allied Puppet comes into play, if you have at least 2 play points, use 2 play points to transform it into a Doll Slayer.
Last Words: Transform a random allied Doll Slayer into a Vier, Doll Slayer.
Vier, Doll Slayer.baseFlair_:
Well, aren't you good? Yes, very nice! Fine and great! Just excellent, yes!
I am Vier! We are ALTERNATIVE! Now show us, show us! Show us your strength, your resolve... your very worth!
Vier, Doll Slayer.evoFlair_:
Come on, show me! And the next me! And the next me, and the next me!
I am Vier! We are Vier! And we are one! Allow us to thank you right away by taking your life!

Mugnier, Purifying Light.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Remove all effects on all other followers except changes to their attack or defense.
Mugnier, Purifying Light.baseFlair_: Yahoo! The impossibly cute Mugnier with a smile of gold, at your service! Now let's get out there and purge this world of filth!
Mugnier, Purifying Light.evoFlair_: Yeah, lotsa people tell me I'm weird or messed up. But it doesn't bother me in the slightest! As long as I get to purge the filth that's all around us, everything's right as rain! Tee-hee!

Phantom Blade Wielder.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
Phantom Blade Wielder.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Recover 1 play point.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, put a Puppet into your hand. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, give it +4/+0.
Phantom Blade Wielder.baseFlair_: One. The heart is the one essential component of the fist. Body? Technique? These things are trivial. Two. Be silent and reflect. Know yourself as you have come to be. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart
Phantom Blade Wielder.evoFlair_: Three. Look at yourself. Look inside. All of Creation resides within you. Four. Only when you know your place within the cosmos, and its place within you, will you attain true mastery. —The Ultimate Way of the Fist: New Testament, Heart

Ameth, Dream Emissary.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give another allied follower Ward. Then, if it's evolved, give it +1/+1, draw a card, and recover 1 play point.
Ameth, Dream Emissary.baseFlair_: Well done today. I'm sure you've forgotten me, so I'll introduce myself again. My name is Ameth. I'm on your side.
Ameth, Dream Emissary.evoFlair_: It must be rough getting dragged into so many different messes, but don't forget you have your own story—make sure you're living it to the fullest. If you find yourself lost, I'll get you back on track.

Lococo, Little Puppeteer.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Transform an enemy follower into a Lococo's Teddy Bear.
Lococo, Little Puppeteer.baseFlair_: People, animals, everybody's always looking at me. Their eyes are scary, I don't like them... Aren't button eyes cuter? Say, won't you become my puppet? Then you won't be scary anymore!
Lococo, Little Puppeteer.evoFlair_: Why is everyone so scary? Cute things are better! You know what, I'll make you into my puppet. That way you'll be cute... Cute forever and ever!

Ralmia, Sonic Racer.baseEffect_:
Rush.
When an allied Artifact card comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.evoEffect_:
Rush.
Evolve: If you have at least 6 play points, use 6 play points and gain Storm and +X/+X. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed this match.
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.baseFlair_:
Thanks to the quick progress of technology, we were able to develop her cybernetic systems. She is swifter than sound and rivals light, far surpassing the limits of flesh and blood. Nothing, not one thing, can touch her.
—Abandoned Lab Note
Ralmia, Sonic Racer.evoFlair_: See how the engine springs forth with a roar; watch how claws of energy leap into being. The master of this device is the most powerful life-form of all. She doesn't hesitate; she downs pulseless metal with a single blow. The struggle between speed and strength has begun.

Dimension Cut.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Resonance is active for you, deal 5 damage instead.

Rocket Knuckles.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. If there are any Artifact cards in your hand, randomly discard 1 and deal 6 damage instead.
Rocket Knuckles.baseFlair_: Whooooa there! Enough tinkering with stuff that don't need tinkering! —Mechanical Soldier

Windup.baseEffect_:
Put a Puppet into your hand.
If Resonance is active for you, put 2 into your hand instead.
Windup.baseFlair_: Someday there might be a puppet who can wind up another puppet. Then they won't need people no more. —Young Artisan

Artifact Call.baseEffect_: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards instead.

Absolute Modesty.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal X damage to a random enemy follower.
If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards with different names destroyed during this match. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Absolute Modesty.baseFlair_: Just as there are seven vices among mortals, there are seven virtues among the gods. The personification of humility seated on her heavenly throne calls out: "Psychomachia, in humility." Countless angels flock to the skies in response.
Absolute Modesty.evoFlair_: The seven virtues each rout one of the seven sins. Seeing greed fester in the earth below, a gentle voice calls out: "Mortals shall learn to be content." Countless angels descend to ensure that the statement becomes reality.

Dimension Dominator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give a follower in your hand Fanfare - Recover 2 play points.
Dimension Dominator.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when you play a follower, recover 1 play point. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Dimension Dominator.baseFlair_: It appears this dimension has yet to understand what control is. Without a strong leader, this plane will eventually wither and die. Then I will take control myself and birth a new generation devoted to obedience and fealty.
Dimension Dominator.evoFlair_: After traversing many dimensions, I've arrived at the conclusion that tyrants invariably bring about society's end. This world will extol my generosity. Control should not be constricting like chains but delicate like thread.

Pull the Strings.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower that costs 2 play points or less, then summon an allied copy of that follower.
If Resonance is active for you, put a Puppet into your hand.
Pull the Strings.baseFlair_: If you see the strings of a puppet, it's because its master no longer saw fit to hide them.

Puppeteer's Strings.baseEffect_:
Put 3 Puppets into your hand.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Puppeteer's Strings.baseFlair_: I thought I'd make you a puppet of my own, but you seem to resist the idea. Do you value your freedom so much? Very well then—I suppose I'll have your life instead.

Alterplane Onslaught.baseEffect_: Banish an enemy follower with 4 defense or less. Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. If Resonance is active for you, put 2 Artifact cards into your hand instead.
Alterplane Onslaught.baseFlair_: A great rift tore the sky open, revealing another sky beyond it. —A farmer's memoirs

Puppet Bomb.baseEffect_:
Summon a Puppet. Then destroy X random enemy followers. X equals the number of allied Puppets in play.
Destroy all allied Puppets.
Puppet Bomb.baseFlair_: Even a puppet needs to cut loose.

Destructive Refrain.baseEffect_: Destroy an allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown. Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals the cost of that card.
Destructive Refrain.baseFlair_: Keep your eyes on your idol, everybody! Show me how much you love me! Show me how much you worship me!

Rebel Against Fate.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Yuwan's Fury or Belphomet's Crackdown.
If Resonance is active for you, instead summon a Mystic Artifact and Ancient Artifact, and randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.

-Alecto, the Dissonant
-Megaera, the Indignant
Rebel Against Fate.baseFlair_: The soldiers have gathered their courage; they are now ready to war against fate. A single voice rings out like a shot over the silent ranks. "The time has come to take up arms. Come, let us carve a path to the future!" The rebellion has begun.

Crystal Cannon.baseEffect_: Whenever an artifact follower that originally costs at least 3 play points comes into play, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader instead.
Crystal Cannon.baseFlair_: From progress comes innovation, and from innovation comes progress.

Mana Pistol Merc.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Mana Pistol Merc.baseFlair_: Swords? Totally barbaric. It's all about firepower, baby!
Mana Pistol Merc.evoFlair_: Bringing a sword to a gun fight? Ha! I'd like to see you try, buddy.

Masked Puppet.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand.
Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
Masked Puppet.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Puppet is destroyed gain +1/+1.
Masked Puppet.baseFlair_: Incomplete, insufficient, imperfect and abandoned by its master. But despite everything, it lives.
Masked Puppet.evoFlair_: Reduced to nothing and recreated from nothing. The mask effectively conceals a steady stream of tears.

Enkidu.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Put a Gilgamesh into your hand if Resonance is active for you.
Enkidu.baseFlair_: The oblivious beast of clay is no more. Through the wisdom of Shamhat, I have awakened and carry this name. Together with the hero, I'll take on this world once again.
Enkidu.evoFlair_: Gugalanna, lords of the stars, what have you, it matters not. Those who bear their fangs to my dearest will be slain—even gods. For my one dear friend, I'll risk it all.

Zealot of Destruction.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy another allied Portalcraft follower or Portalcraft amulet without Countdown, and then summon an Analyzing Artifact.
Zealot of Destruction.baseFlair_: Yesss! Destroy, destroy, destroy! But if we diiid decide to keep something after all has been smashed to bits, perhaps it may be an idol... A beacon for the world, crafted by my very own hands.
Zealot of Destruction.evoFlair_: Follow her into the deepest of shadows. To recreate the idol of destruction herself is to earn the authority to destroy—and within the shadow of destruction lies creation.

Unidentified Subject.baseEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
Unidentified Subject.evoEffect_: Whenever an effect puts cards into your deck, gain +1/+0.
Unidentified Subject.baseFlair_: In our experiments, we paired a human's body with a demon's blood. Using the organs of a beast, and a heart of black iron, we created something unspeakable, unidentifiable.
Unidentified Subject.evoFlair_: Not human, demon, nor beast. It swelled as if it were water, and moaned in agony. We created something truly horrifying that day—an abomination without purpose.

Automaton Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +0/+1 and Ward to all Puppets in your hand.
Automaton Soldier.baseFlair_: Comparable to a spider, the doll quickly latches onto any unfortunate soul entangled in its intricately woven threads.
Automaton Soldier.evoFlair_: Its entangled threads stained with drops of vermillion, the true nature of the doll is revealed as it greedily devours its prey.

Dirk, Steelarm Battler.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card that costs at least 3 play points from your deck into your hand.
Dirk, Steelarm Battler.baseFlair_: Talking's... something I'm pretty bad at. That's why this thing... does the talking for me. My new arm...
Dirk, Steelarm Battler.evoFlair_: Talking's not... what I do well. I think I'll come in handy too. Let's battle together... I'll do everything I can.

Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Go, Go, Robomi!
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Subtract 3 from that amulet's Countdown.
Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.baseFlair_: So your name's Robomi, huh? It's amazing that an eons-old machina soldier can move and talk. I'm Nicholas, and I'll be taking care of your maintenance from now on, Robomi!
Nicholas, Stalwart Inventor.evoFlair_: The same technology used to create Robomi... I'll use it to protect the ones I love! Gigante Suit ready! Nicholas, lifting off!

Hakrabi.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand. Repeat once if Resonance is active for you.
Hakrabi.baseFlair_: Entirety set right. Naught set to its counter. Now, you too must step upon the scales.
Hakrabi.evoFlair_: Bear the burden of this world and the weight of mankind—achieve equilibrium and balance the heavens and earth.

Lasershell Tortoise.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Machina or Natura follower from your hand into play. Give it Rush and the following effect: At the end of your turn, return this follower to your hand.
Lasershell Tortoise.baseFlair_:
Concept: Automated artillery barrage
Subjects: All organisms capable of conveying laser turrets
Mission: Development of creature that is weapon and carrier in one
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team Z
Lasershell Tortoise.evoFlair_:
Organic life has donned steel, shouldered machinery, and assumed the robe of power. It roars, "We reign supreme; these machines are our attendants." This biological drive for dominance is vital; it's what propels us into the future.
—In Defense of Machines, Part 2

Mind Splitter.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover X play points. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
At the end of your turn, if you have at least 1 play point, draw a card. Then, if you have at least 3 play points, subtract 2 from its cost.

Mind Splitter.baseFlair_: I am the Two of Swords, exemplar of denial. The only path is forward. The only thing worth honing is skill. Nothing else matters. All these tools are at my disposal. No one will stand in my way.
Mind Splitter.evoFlair_: He is a master swordsman; his ideal state is stillness. To him, nothing need exist... Yet he realizes: he denies, therefore he is. Quickly, he turns his tools towards his own mind; he shreds away at his consciousness, hoping to one day return to his purest form.

Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Spinaria's Artifact.
Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.evoEffect_: Whenever an allied Artifact follower comes into play, give that follower the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.baseFlair_: These artifacts move at my command, but they do nothing for my lonely heart.
Spinaria, Keeper of Enigmas.evoFlair_: Somebody, anybody! Please rescue me from this life of solitude. For such a companion, I would do anything...

Deus Ex Machina.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effects - Whenever you play an Artifact card, recover 1 play point. At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you, discard your hand and draw 6 cards. (These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Deus Ex Machina.baseFlair_: Someone has to make sure fate stays in balance. I can restore order, or let chaos consume this world. Now then, which one will it be?
Deus Ex Machina.evoFlair_: Rotate the eternal wheel of fate, and the truth of the world reveals itself. Reach the limits of the world so that it may change forevermore. How far will you go?

Dyne, Master Swordsman.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. If the total cost of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match is at least 20, deal 5 damage instead.
Dyne, Master Swordsman.baseFlair_: Look, life's not about following the pack, nor about creating a name for yourself. It's like this—when you get to be a certain age, you begin to see the right path. Eye for an eye, tooth for a tooth. That's why you gotta fight only those that are ready for it.
Dyne, Master Swordsman.evoFlair_: Look, I don't plan to boast. The fact this sword chose me is just coincidence, you see. But even us older folk, we've got dreams. It doesn't embarrass me at all to say that's why I live my life rewarding virtue and punishing vice.

Zwei, Resonant Heart.baseEffect_:
Accelerate (2): Summon 2 Puppets.
----------
Fanfare: Put 2 Puppets into your hand.
Zwei, Resonant Heart.baseFlair_:
Fear. Rage. Hatred. Affection—no, it's useless. I can't express all my heart feels for you. But I wonder... What do you make of me now?
—Orchis, Linked Heart
Zwei, Resonant Heart.evoFlair_: From near and far, she sought a heart. The purpose of her creation. Her purpose in this world. Seeking the knowledge for herself, she continues her journey. As the answers are revealed, her heart beats on.

Pop Goes the Poppet.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower. Then deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals the destroyed follower's attack.
Pop Goes the Poppet.baseFlair_: I hate attention. I get enough of that from doll aficionados.

Captivating Conductor.baseEffect_:
Select 2 followers in play. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
(Can be played only when 2 targetable followers are in play.)
Captivating Conductor.baseFlair_: I'll transcribe your cries to my scores and use those tears to play my orchestra! Let the concerto begin...

Otherworld Rift.baseEffect_:
Banish an enemy follower.
Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Otherworld Rift.baseFlair_: Somewhere within the vast, infinite reaches of this dimension, surely there's a place befitting you.

Heartless Battle.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Lloyd the Android or Victoria. Put a Puppet into your hand.
Enhance (7): Give the summoned follower +0/+3 and Bane.
Heartless Battle.baseFlair_: "This is a fight for Orchis!" "If that's what you want, then it's what you'll get!" —Zwei and Orchis

Artifact Spark.baseEffect_:
Transform an Artifact card in your hand into an Artifact Spark.
Deal 4 damage to the enemy leader.
(Can be played only when a targetable Artifact card is in your hand.)
Artifact Spark.baseFlair_: Only through the perspective of man can nothingness be. Through the perspective of the universe, even nothing exists as something.

Black Iron Soldier.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Artifact card from your deck into your hand.
Black Iron Soldier.baseFlair_: My mission has only just begun—this flesh of iron will be your end!
Black Iron Soldier.evoFlair_: My mission continues—you will not survive, for I am black iron incarnate!

Captain Meteo.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
Captain Meteo.baseFlair_: They ain't much to look at, but they're everything to me... You won't lay a hand on my crew—these arms are for protecting!
Captain Meteo.evoFlair_: What'd you say to me, punk? Never underestimate a pirate! Don't say I didn't warn ya—these arms are for fighting!

Mechanical Mammoth.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If Resonance is active for you, gain Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3.
Mechanical Mammoth.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. We set out to create a prototype soldier— instead, a different beast was born. At times it takes the form of man. At others, a monster. We had no way of predicting it. —Mechalab Sound Archives (File 001)
Mechanical Mammoth.evoFlair_: With the dawn of the mechanical age, the definition of the "optimal figure" has changed. Whether a creation takes form as a skillful man or powerful beast, either one shall serve its purpose effortlessly. —Comparison of Mechanical Mammoth and Prototype Soldier

Basileus, Outworld Invader.evoEffect_: Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less.
Basileus, Outworld Invader.baseFlair_: This... This must be the inner garden. Ahaha... I've arrived! To think all I needed to make it to the promised land was cross that pathetic barrier!
Basileus, Outworld Invader.evoFlair_: Now then, how should I start with this garden's destruction? Aha... I know just the trick. I'll thoroughly grind it to dust! Ahaha!

Safira, Synthetic Beast.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Evolve this follower and this follower's attack is X until the end of the turn. X equals the number of allied Artifact cards destroyed during this match.
Safira, Synthetic Beast.baseFlair_: A synthetic body, a synthetic life, a crossbreed. Neither human nor beast, what is my purpose in this life?
Safira, Synthetic Beast.evoFlair_: What is my purpose in this life? I'll find my true purpose and make something of myself someday—just watch!

Cannon Hermit Crab.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, if Resonance is active for you or if an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, summon a Cannon Hermit Crab and change its attack and defense to X/Y. X and Y are equal to half this follower's attack and defense, rounded up.
Cannon Hermit Crab.baseFlair_:
Concept: Waterproof and fully automated.
Subjects: Creatures already accustomed to armor.
Mission: Protect the peace without the need for human personnel.
—Domination Plan Proposal, Team C
Cannon Hermit Crab.evoFlair_: The giant hermit crab peacekeeping experiment came to a most startling conclusion: the number of test subject crabs no longer matched up with the number of equipment sets produced. Further investigation will be required to find out why. For the good of all of us.

New Order.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all cards in your deck. Then put 10 Mystic Artifacts, 10 Radiant Artifacts, and 10 Prime Artifacts into your deck.
New Order.baseFlair_: After they were abandoned by their god, the sages began to dream. They would remake their philosophy, the laws of the world... the world itself. Thousands of forsaken souls united to give birth to a single mechanism. A single whole. A single... order.
New Order.evoFlair_: The new order burst from the old world's body, turned, and consumed it. One planet was not enough to sate its hunger; and so it devoured and grew. As it waxed in size and power, it knew it was no mere creation. It was the sum and the genesis of all the cosmos's principles.

Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Banish all Machina cards from your deck. Put X Tisiphone, the Malignants, Y Alecto, the Dissonants, and Z Megaera, the Indignants into your deck. X, Y, and Z equal the number of Machina cards banished from your deck split randomly.
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a random Machina card from your deck into your hand.
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.baseFlair_: What value is there in emotion? It's all just a dumb processing error. That's why I have to reclaim, reduce, and recycle them all—they're junk! Junk that I created! It hurts the pride to see your creations grow inefficient!
Belphomet, Lord of Aiolon.evoFlair_: Stop laughing. Stop crying. And stop staring at me like that. You're going to make me vomit with those stupid expressions. You know what, forget it. It's termination for you. I'll wring the oxygen from your lungs, the tears from your ducts, and the life from your body!

Bearminator.baseEffect_:
Rush.

Bearminator.evoFlair_:
Activating Ometeotl: all systems online.

Inputting extermination sequence... Approved.
Things are about to get ugly.

Ward.

Did you hear about the statue our neighbors gave us?

After it started movin', it crushed a lot of good men.
"Strengthening battle parameters."
Silver Automaton.evoFlair_:
No matter what we did, it kept fighting.
"Damage minimal. Continuing battle operations."
When reinforcements arrived, it transformed.
"More targets acquired. Switching to annihilation mode."

"Not bad, not bad at all! I could get used to your brand of archery! Why don't you sail the seas with us aboard my ship, lassie?"
"Nah, I don't think I'd be able to stand you. I'll pass."
—Captain Meteo and Dazzling Archer

Colossal Construct.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of remaining Artifact cards in your deck.

A construct of bronze, created to serve as a guardian of the south island. It never misses its rounds—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.

Colossal Construct.evoFlair_:
As time marched on, the people eventually forgot its purpose. Even so, its trembles can be heard like clockwork—once in the morning, once in the afternoon, and once in the evening.

Zwei, Murderous Puppet.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied Victoria the ability to attack 2 times per turn.
Zwei, Murderous Puppet.baseFlair_: No one mocks me! I mean, I'm perfect! If you can't accept that, then I won't accept you!
Zwei, Murderous Puppet.evoFlair_: Oh, so I'm broken? A defect? That's so selfish of you to say! You won't get away with this! You won't! I'll shred anything that mocks me. Victoria!

Artifact Duplicator.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly summon copies of different allied Artifact followers destroyed during this match until your area is full.
Artifact Duplicator.baseFlair_:
The artifacts, they do not speak. One therefore shouldn't rely on language when dealing with them.
The veteran technician's actions communicated this to us.
—Specialist Records, Chapter 6
Artifact Duplicator.evoFlair_: (The artifacts speak. Every circuit in them tells an eloquent story. I don't talk to them because there's just no need—and, well, I'm the quiet type.)

Rush.
Strike: Put 3 Artifact Rhinos into your deck.

Magna Giant.evoFlair_:
"So you command this machine... A very impressive display! However! Valor is as equally important as power! Now witness, as the dawn of a new age rises—Magnaaa... Giaaant!"
—Magna Giant to Gullias, Silverbeast Lord

Concept: Base strength reinforced with armor and weaponry. Fully automated.
Subjects: Giant monsters with intellect.

Dreadnought Gorilla.evoFlair_: People may be foolish, thought the gorilla, but they make great things. After making full use of their new weapons to earn victory in battle, the gorilla ignored orders to return to base and struck out on its own. For the good of all of us.

Fusion: Machina
----------
Rush.

-Summon an Armored Tentacle.
-Summon an Assault Tentacle.
-Gain +3/+3 and draw 3 cards. (Draw up to 3 times.)
Belphomet, Worldreaver.baseFlair_: So you've gathered up courage. Ooh, I'm so scared. Hah! I might find your efforts cute if they weren't so nauseating. Listen, I know the unknown—and I've seen your fates. So shut up, give up, and get those disgraceful mugs out of my sight. This world's already mine!
Belphomet, Worldreaver.evoFlair_: Desire, faith... The strong don't need any of that. Know why? They have it all already! They believe in nothing but themselves! So come on, do your dance of fury. Gather at your pity parties; spin your feeble bonds. It's meaningless—all of it! This world's already mine!

Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Put a Puppet into your hand. Give +1/+0 and Storm to all Puppets in your hand.
Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.baseFlair_: The depths of this sorrow are eternal. The past, the future—they matter not. All that remains is the pain of loss.
Vengeful Puppeteer Noah.evoFlair_: Kill, my puppets! The time for vengeance has come. My hopes and dreams are but naught. If I cannot have her back, at least you'll have a taste of my anguish!

Amethyst Giant.evoFlair_: Would you truly believe the gods to be flawless and unquestionable? Simply observe their failed creations—neglected and cast aside.

----------

Tylle, the Worldgate.baseFlair_: I keep the link between the inner and outer realms: the Worldgate. And once opened, it shall usher in a new order. The novel will bring forth advancement, while the obsolete will fall to the wayside. But, please. Do not fear the coming change.
Tylle, the Worldgate.evoFlair_: I am but an observer, distantly peering toward the dual realms. Never once have I visited this world, until calamity reared its head. I am most fortunate the light and winds have brought me to you.

Accelerate (1): Select a card in your hand and banish the rest. Draw a card for each card you banished. If this is your first turn, draw 1 more.
----------
